Dumbo.Title: Dumbo
Dumbo.Plot: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

Emperor's New Groove.Title: The Emperor's New Groove
Emperor's New Groove.Plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne and his human form with the help of Pacha, a gentle llama herder.

The Lorax.Title: The Lorax
The Lorax.Plot: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

Yellow Submarine.Title: Yellow Submarine
Yellow Submarine.Plot: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

Coraline.Title: Coraline
Coraline.Plot: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.

Corpse Bride.Title: Corpse Bride
Corpse Bride.Plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

Frankenweenie.Title: Frankenweenie
Frankenweenie.Plot: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

Aladdin.Title: Aladdin
Aladdin.Plot: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Finding Nemo.Title: Finding Nemo
Finding Nemo.Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Inside Out.Title: Inside Out
Inside Out.Plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Luca.Title: Luca
Luca.Plot: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

Moana 2.Title: Moana 2
Moana 2.Plot: After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana must journey to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she's ever faced.

Monsters inc.Title: Monsters, Inc.
Monsters inc.Plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

Monsters University.Title: Monsters University
Monsters University.Plot: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski and James P. "Sully" Sullivan during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

Mulan.Title: Mulan
Mulan.Plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Pinocchio.Title: Pinocchio
Pinocchio.Plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

The Incredibles.Title: The Incredibles
The Incredibles.Plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

The Jungle Book.Title: The Jungle Book
The Jungle Book.Plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

The Land Before Time.Title: The Land Before Time
The Land Before Time.Plot: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

The Lion King.Title: The Lion King
The Lion King.Plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Toy Story.Title: Toy Story
Toy Story.Plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Wall E.Title: WALL·E
Wall E.Plot: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

The Iron Giant.Title: The Iron Giant
The Iron Giant.Plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Chicken Little.Title: Chicken Little
Chicken Little.Plot: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

Fantastic Mr Fox.Title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
Fantastic Mr Fox.Plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

How To Train Your Dragon.Title: How to Train Your Dragon
How To Train Your Dragon.Plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

Isle Of Dogs.Title: Isle of Dogs
Isle Of Dogs.Plot: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

Kung Fu Panda.Title: Kung Fu Panda
Kung Fu Panda.Plot: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

Madagascar.Title: Madagascar
Madagascar.Plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

Marcel the Shell with Shoes On.Title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
Marcel the Shell with Shoes On.Plot: A cash-strapped documentary maker decides to make his newest documentary about a mollusk shell he finds living in his Airbnb with his friends.

Paddington.Title: Paddington
Paddington.Plot: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

Penguins of Madagascar.Title: Penguins of Madagascar
Penguins of Madagascar.Plot: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

Ponyo.Title: Ponyo
Ponyo.Plot: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

Rango.Title: Rango
Rango.Plot: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

The Red Turtle.Title: The Red Turtle
The Red Turtle.Plot: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a big red turtle, which changes his life.

We Bare Bears.Title: We Bare Bears
We Bare Bears.Plot: Three bear brothers do whatever they can to be a part of human society by doing what everyone around them does.

Zootopia.Title: Zootopia
Zootopia.Plot: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Spirited Away.Title: Spirited Away
Spirited Away.Plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

The Lost Thing.Title: The Lost Thing
The Lost Thing.Plot: A boy finds a strange creature on a beach, and decides to find a home for it in a world where everyone believes there are far more important things to pay attention to.

The Secret of Kells.Title: The Secret of Kells
The Secret of Kells.Plot: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

The Boy and the Heron.Title: The Boy and the Heron
The Boy and the Heron.Plot: In the wake of his mother's death and his father's remarriage, a headstrong boy named Mahito ventures into a dreamlike world shared by both the living and the dead.

Wolfwalkers.Title: Wolfwalkers
Wolfwalkers.Plot: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.
